Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionObserver
public class Lobby extends Object implements ConnectionObserver
Lobby manages the game and invokes game functions
